item.title: A Simple Framework for Generalization in Visual RL under Dynamic Scene Perturbations
item.description: SimGRL: A novel framework boosts visual reinforcement learning’s generalization by mitigating imbalanced saliency and observational overfitting through a feature-level frame stack and shifted random o…
